![](/assets/img/Leonhard_Euler_2.jpg){.euler}

Here you'll find me working through answering the Project Euler problems using both R & Python (& Math of course)!

I'm treating R as a first class citizen, a feat that I think is a bit novel as the majority of members have answered using Python, C/C++, Java, & C#.

[Code Languages](https://projecteuler.net/languages) used by Project Euler members.
